resources.string: "This simple application provides access to the input language settings for your device's keyboard."
Click here to open language settings

Source code for this app is available online at https://github.com/shaftekbiz/android-language-settings-app. Comments are welcome via email to android-dev@shaftek.biz or via our website at http://www.shaftek.biz/contact.
This is version 1.5, built on October 5th, 2012.
